name: Train View
description:
First prototype of a game. You have to find specific objects in the train and outside the train (you can move forward and backward, in the goal to approach the window and see outside) 

It's just one level as prototype, you can press the Escape button to quit the game, or finishthe game to click the button "Quitter" 

Have fun !

All Asset 3D are from https://thebasemesh.com/model-library, 

Sprite for the UI is from the Asset Store of Unity, 2D Casual UI HD from MiMU Studio

Music is from freesound. 

This prototype is of course not marketable
